sen.j: 京極 高聡（きょうごく たかとし、寛政11年（1799年） - 文政13年3月15日 (旧暦)（1830年4月7日））は、丹後国峰山藩の世嗣。
sen.e: Takatoshi KYOGOKU (1799 - April 7, 1830) was an heir to Mineyama domain in Tango Province.
Takatoshi KYOGOKU (1799 - April 7, 1830) was an heir to Mineyama Domain in Tango Province.
Takatoshi KYOGOKU (1799 - April 7, 1830) was an heir to Mineyama Domain in Tango Province.

sen.j: 第7代藩主・京極高備の次男。
sen.e: He was the second son of Takamasa KYOGOKU, the seventh lord of the domain.
He was the second son of Takamasa KYOGOKU, the seventh lord of the domain.
He was the second son of Takamasa KYOGOKU, the seventh lord of the domain.

sen.j: 正室は毛利広鎮の娘、継室は稲垣長続の娘、森忠賛の娘。
sen.e: His lawful wife was a daughter of Hiroshige MORI, and his second wives were a daughter of Nagatsugu INAGAKI and a daughter of Tadasuke MORI.
His lawful wife was a daughter of Hiroshige MORI, and his second wives were a daughter of Nagatsugu INAGAKI and a daughter of Tadasuke MORI.

sen.j: 官位は従五位下、備後国守。
sen.e: His official rank was Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade, and he was the governor of Bingo Province.
His official rank was Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade, and he was the governor of Bingo Province.

sen.j: 兄の京極高寧が早世したため嫡子となる。
sen.e: As his older brother Takayasu KYOGOKU died young, he became the heir.
As his older brother Takayasu KYOGOKU died young, he became the heir.

sen.j: しかし、家督を継ぐことなく文政13年（1830年）に32歳で没した。
sen.e: Unfortunately, he died in 1830 at the age of 31 before succeeding his father.
Unfortunately, he died in 1830 at the age of 32 before succeeding his father.

sen.j: 子がなかったため、弟の京極高倍が代わって嫡子となった。
sen.e: As he had no child, his younger brother became the heir.
